text: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes is an American science-fiction movie directed by Matt Reeves. It stars Andy Serkis, Gary Oldman, Jason Clarke, and Keri Russell. It is the sequel to the 2011 movie Rise of the Planet of the Apes. It was released on July 11, 2014. A sequel to the movie War for the Planet of the Apes was released on July 14, 2017. A second sequel Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes was released on May 10, 2024. ==References== Category:2014 science fiction movies Category:Planet of the Apes movies Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Movies directed by Matt Reeves Category:Post-apocalyptic movies Category:Dystopian movies Category:Movies about apes Category:Movies about genetic engineering Category:Movies set in forests Category:Movies set in the future Category:Movies set in the 21st century Category:Movies composed by Michael Giacchino
title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
